body:
Comment 6: 
I agree with rsc that this program is invalid today.  I agree with r that this program
ought to be valid.  I can't see any good reason to make a program like this invalid:

    pow10 := make([]bool, 1e10)
    pow10[1e0] = true
    pow10[1e1] = true
    pow10[1e2] = true
    pow10[1e3] = true
    ...
